template.name: Template App Docker - Agent 1
template.description: Get Docker engine metrics using zabbix-agent 1

item.name: Docker: Containers paused
item.description: Total number of containers paused on this host

item.name: Docker: Containers running
item.description: Total number of containers running on this host

item.name: Docker: Containers stopped
item.description: Total number of containers stopped on this host

item.name: Docker: Containers total
item.description: Total number of containers on this host

trigger.name: Docker: Failed to fetch info data (or no data for 30m)
trigger.description: Zabbix has not received data for items for the last 30 minutes

trigger.name: Docker: Version has changed (new version: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: Docker version has changed. Ack to close.

trigger_prototype.name: Docker: Container {#NAME}: CPU Usage is high (>{$DOCKER.CPU.USAGE_HIGH}% for 5min)
Docker: Container {#NAME}: Memory usage is critical (>{$DOCKER.MEM.USAGE_CRITICAL}% for 5min)
Docker: Container {#NAME}: Memory usage is high (>{$DOCKER.MEM.USAGE_HIGH}% for 5min)

dependency.name: Docker: Container {#NAME}: Memory usage is critical (>{$DOCKER.MEM.USAGE_CRITICAL}% for 5min)

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template App Docker - Agent 1:docker.container.net.rx_errors[{#ID}].min(3m)}>{$DOCKER.NET.ERROR_THRESHOLD} or {Template App Docker - Agent 1:docker.container.net.tx_errors[{#ID}].min(3m)}>{$DOCKER.NET.ERROR_THRESHOLD} or {Template App Docker - Agent 1:docker.container.net.tx_dropped[{#ID}].min(3m)}>{$DOCKER.NET.ERROR_THRESHOLD} or {Template App Docker - Agent 1:docker.container.net.rx_dropped[{#ID}].min(3m)}>{$DOCKER.NET.ERROR_THRESHOLD}
trigger_prototype.name: Docker: Container {#NAME}: Network errors (>{$DOCKER.NET.ERROR_THRESHOLD} for 3min)

macro.description: Percent of container CPU usage to trigger warning
Percent of container memory usage considered critical
Percent of container memory usage to trigger warning
Number of dropped packets or errors in a container to trigger a warning
Docker socket to use for API access
